dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description:
This is a Python implementation of John Gruber's Markdown. It is almost
completely compliant with the reference implementation, though there are
a few very minor differences. See John's Syntax Documentation for the
syntax rules.
dependencies.name: py-markdown

dependencies.description:
MarkupSafe is a library for Python that implements a unicode string that
is aware of HTML escaping rules and can be used to implement automatic
string escaping. It is used by Jinja 2, the Mako templating engine, the
Pylons web framework and many more.
dependencies.name: py-markupsafe

dependencies.description:
MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator
that's geared towards building project documentation.
dependencies.name: py-mkdocs

dependencies.description: Automatically link across pages in MkDocs.
dependencies.name: py-mkdocs-autorefs

dependencies.description: A PEP 517 backend for PDM that supports PEP 621 metadata.
dependencies.name: py-pdm-pep517

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description: Automatic documentation from sources, for MkDocs.
name: py-mkdocstrings

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
